43 int main(int argc, char **argv)
44 {
45  ros::init(argc, argv, "sendObj_obst_test");
46  sendObj node;
47  // node.SendVitoHome();
48 
49  ROS_INFO("[sendObj] Node is ready");
50 
51  double spin_rate = 10;
52  ros::param::get("~spin_rate",spin_rate);
53  ROS_DEBUG( "Spin Rate %lf", spin_rate);
54 
55  ros::Rate rate(spin_rate);
56 
57  while (node.nh.ok())
58  {
59  ros::spinOnce();
60  rate.sleep();
61  }
62  return 0;
63 }

68 sendObj::sendObj()
69 {
70  sub_grid_ = nh.subscribe("send_obst", 1, &sendObj::obst, this);
71  nh.param<std::string>("/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_list_right", obstacles_topic_right, "/right_arm/PotentialFieldControl/obstacle_pose_right");
72  geometries_publisher_ = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray > (obstacles_topic_right.c_str(),1);
73  marker_publisher_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker >( "frame_obst", 1 );
74 }

77 void sendObj::obst(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr &msg)
78 {
79  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray fittedGeometriesArrayMsg;
80  int p = 0;
81  std::cout<<"sms"<<std::endl;
82  int loop = msg->data.size()/5;
83  std::vector<KDL::Frame> vect_obst;
84  std::vector<double> geom_radius;
85  std::vector<double> geom_height;
86 
87  for( int i=0; i< loop;i++)
88  {
89  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle fittedGeometriesSingleMsg;
90 
91  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.position.x = msg->data[0+p];
92  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.position.y = msg->data[1+p];
93  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.position.z = msg->data[2+p];
94  Eigen::Matrix3d transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
95  transformation_.row(0) << 1,0,0;
96  transformation_.row(1) << 0,1,0;
97  transformation_.row(2) << 0,0,1;
98  Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_hand(transformation_);
99  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.orientation.x = quat_eigen_hand.x();
100  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.orientation.y = quat_eigen_hand.y();
101  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.orientation.z = quat_eigen_hand.z();
102  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose.orientation.w = quat_eigen_hand.w();
103  std::vector<double> geom_info;
104  geom_info.push_back(msg->data[3+p]);
105  geom_info.push_back(msg->data[4+p]);
106  geom_radius.push_back(msg->data[3+p]);
107  geom_height.push_back(msg->data[4+p]);
108  for(unsigned int j=0; j< geom_info.size();j++)
109  {
110  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.info.push_back(geom_info[j]);
111  }
112 
113  fittedGeometriesArrayMsg.geometries.push_back( fittedGeometriesSingleMsg );
114  p += 5;
115  KDL::Frame frame_obj;
116  tf::poseMsgToKDL(fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose, frame_obj);
117  vect_obst.push_back(frame_obj);
118  }
119 
120 
121  generateMarkerMessages( vect_obst, geom_radius, geom_height );
122  // std::cout<<"pubblico"<<std::endl;
123 
124  geometries_publisher_.publish(fittedGeometriesArrayMsg);
125 }
126 
127 void sendObj::generateMarkerMessages( std::vector<KDL::Frame> &Obj_pose, std::vector<double> radius, std::vector<double> height )
128 {
129  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Obj_pose.size(); ++i)
130  {
131  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
132  marker.header.frame_id = "vito_anchor";
133  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time();
134  marker.ns = "";
135  marker.id = i;
136  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::CYLINDER;
137  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
138 
139  marker.pose.position.x = Obj_pose[i].p.x();
140  marker.pose.position.y = Obj_pose[i].p.y();
141  marker.pose.position.z = Obj_pose[i].p.z();
142  double x,y,z,w;
143  Obj_pose[i].M.GetQuaternion(x,y,z,w);
144 
145  marker.pose.orientation.x = x;
146  marker.pose.orientation.y = y;
147  marker.pose.orientation.z = z;
148  marker.pose.orientation.w = w;
149 
150  marker.scale.x = radius[i];
151  marker.scale.y = radius[i];
152  marker.scale.z = height[i];
153 
154  marker.color.a = 1.0; // for the clearness
155  marker.color.r = 0.0;
156  marker.color.g = 0.0;
157  marker.color.b = 1.0;
158  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(100);
159  marker_publisher_.publish(marker);
160 
161  std::string obst_name= "obj_" + std::to_string(i);
162 
163  tf::Transform tfGeomTRansform;
164  geometry_msgs::Pose p;
165  tf::poseKDLToMsg (Obj_pose[i], p );
166  tf::poseMsgToTF( p, tfGeomTRansform );
167  tf_geometriesTransformations_.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfGeomTRansform, ros::Time::now(), "vito_anchor", obst_name.c_str()) );
168  }
169 }
